20101208020336.714|20101208020338.143|CCO|ABOUT THE TAX CUT DEAL.
20101208020338.143|20101208020339.571|CCO|HE ARGUED HE PUT THE GOOD OF
20101208020339.571|20101208020341.000|CCO|THE COUNTRY AHEAD OF POLITICS

20101208020343.000|20101208020345.000|CCO|THEIR DEMANDS TO EXTEND ALL
20101208020345.000|20101208020347.000|CCO|TAX CUTS EVEN FOR THE WEALTHY.
20101208020347.000|20101208020349.000|CCO|>> I'VE SAID BEFORE THAT I
20101208020349.000|20101208020351.000|CCO|FELT THAT THE MIDDLE CLASS TAX
20101208020351.000|20101208020353.000|CCO|CUTS WERE BEING HELD HOSTAGE
20101208020353.000|20101208020355.000|CCO|TO THE HIGH-END TAX CUTS.
20101208020355.000|20101208020357.000|CCO|I THINK IT'S TEMPTING NOT TO
20101208020357.000|20101208020359.000|CCO|NEGOTIATE WITH HOSTAGE TAKERS
20101208020359.000|20101208020401.000|CCO|UNLESS THE HOSTAGE GETS
20101208020401.000|20101208020403.000|CCO|HARMED.
20101208020403.000|20101208020405.000|CCO|THEN PEOPLE WILL QUESTION THE
20101208020405.000|20101208020407.000|CCO|WISDOM OF THAT STRATEGY.
20101208020407.000|20101208020409.000|CCO|IN THIS CASE, THE HOSTAGE WAS
20101208020409.000|20101208020411.000|CCO|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE.
20101208020411.000|20101208020413.500|CCO|AND I WAS NOT WILLING TO SEE
20101208020413.500|20101208020416.000|CCO|THEM GET HARMED.
20101208020416.000|20101208020418.500|CCO|NOW I COULD COULD ENVOYED THE...
20101208020418.500|20101208020421.000|CCO|I COULD HAVE ENJOYED THE

20101208020443.000|20101208020445.000|CCO|TAX BREAKS FOR ALL INCOME

20101208020455.000|20101208020457.000|CCO|CONTINUE THE TAX CREDIT FOR

20101208020507.000|20101208020509.000|CCO|THAN $5 MILLION.

20101208020625.286|20101208020626.714|CCO|YEARS.

20101208020646.000|20101208020647.667|CCO|EFFECT A VERY SMALL AMOUNT ON

20101208020658.143|20101208020659.571|CCO|>> THIS IS THE PUBLIC OPTION
20101208020659.571|20101208020701.000|CCO|DEBATE ALL OVER AGAIN.

20101208020714.333|20101208020717.667|CCO|THERE WAS A PROVISION IN THERE

20101208020753.000|20101208020755.000|CCO|SATISFACTION OF HAVING A

20101208020807.667|20101208020809.333|CCO|TOUGH WE ARE.
20101208020809.333|20101208020811.000|CCO|IN THE MEANTIME THE AMERICAN

20101208022708.143|20101208022709.571|CCO|OF WHAT IS THE NEW MEDIA, WHAT

20101208022713.000|20101208022715.000|CCO|OF A 1917 CRIMINAL STATUTE
20101208022715.000|20101208022717.000|CCO|CALLED THE ESPIONAGE ACT.
20101208022717.000|20101208022719.000|CCO|>> Ifill: WHAT WE REMEMBER IS
